sentence.Network_en: Free range and battery eggs, boiled for four minutes, were hard to tell apart.
sentence.Network_cn: 柴鸡蛋和笼养鸡蛋在煮过4分钟之后很难区分。

sentence.Network_en: " We're giving up free range, getting organized, feathering our emotions.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我们正在放弃自己驰骋的天地, 组织起来, 矫饰感情.

sentence.Network_en: My job gives me free range of a sort. As much as you can find nowadays.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的职业给了我某种自由驰骋的天地, 是当今能得到的最大的天地了.

list.abs: paper presents a range - free distributed algorithm consists of scale - localization algorithm and improved controllable flood ., 该文提出的无测距分布式定位算法由比例定位法和改进的可控泛洪法组成.

list.url: http://tw.news.yahoo.com/动团揭露-格子笼蛋鸡-饲养惨状-061524760.html
list.abs: ...传统格子笼的饲养法，室内放养的平饲（Barn）或是放牧（Free range）饲养，让鸡有更大的空间活动，设有高于地面的栖架让鸡可 …
...有4种，即层架式鸡笼(battery cage)、自由放养(free range)、自由活动式(free run)和富集型鸡笼(furnished cage)。

entry.def: Free-range means relating to a system of keeping animals in which they can move and feed freely on an area of open ground.

means.word_mean: 1. of livestock and domestic poultry; permitted to graze or forage rather than being confined to a feedlot
